meanings.definition: The action of making someone a saint in the Roman Catholic Church.
meanings.sent1: The beatifications of saints are celebrated with great joy in the church.
meanings.sent2: The beatifications of Mother Teresa and Pope John Paul II were significant events.
meanings.sent3: During the beatifications, the saints probably have a big smile on their faces!
meanings.sent4: The beatifications transform ordinary individuals into revered figures.
meanings.sent5: The beatifications are like shining stars in the sky of faith.

meanings.definition: The state of being blessed or happy.
meanings.sent1: Her beatifications were evident in her constant smile and positive attitude.
meanings.sent2: The beatifications of the newlyweds were clear to everyone at the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: Even on a rainy day, his beatifications never seemed to fade.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of beatifications, happiness blooms like colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The beatifications of a content heart radiate warmth to all around.
